item.title: Motorola Solutions CTO says AI-powered ‘smart’ surveillance cameras will make the world safer
item.description: Scaling an AI project from a small test to a widely deployed service is a major undertaking requiring organizations to weigh costs and accuracy risks ...

item.title: Accused UnitedHealthcare CEO murderer Luigi Mangione refused extradition to New York, court spokesperson confirms

item.title: Walgreens’ stock rockets higher on report of talks of sale to private equity

item.title: Dow ends lower for 4th straight day as stocks pause rally ahead of CPI report
